name: Vanilla_Node.js-API
description: > Full CRUD REST API using Node.js with no framework This is for learning/experimental purposes.  ``` # Routes GET      /api/products POST     /api/products GET      /api/products/:id PUT      /api/products/:id DELETE   /api/products/:id ``` ## Usage ``` # Install dependencies npm install yarn install # Run in develpment npm run dev yarn run dev # Run in production npm start yarn start ```
